app.title: Hanoi - Pieces of Time
app.subtitle: Explore Old Quarter memories via AR interaction
app.description: Game to explore Hanoi history and culture via Augmented Reality.

qr.instructions: Point your camera at the marker images on the book pages
qr.error: Failed to detect marker. Please try again.
qr.notFound: Page not found. Please scan a valid marker.

ar.trainingMarker: Training marker (first time may take 1-2 minutes)
ar.trainingHint: AR.js needs to train the marker image for the first time. Please wait and keep camera steady. This only happens once.
ar.tracking: Point camera at the image on the book page
ar.trackingLost: Tracking lost. Please point camera back at the book page.
ar.trackingFound: Tracking found! Video will play automatically.

video.error: Failed to load video. Please check your connection.

errors.cameraNotAvailable: Camera not available. Please use a device with a camera.
errors.cameraInUse: Camera is being used by another application. Please close other apps and try again.
errors.videoLoadError: Failed to load video. Please try again.
errors.aframeLoadError: Failed to load A-Frame. Please check your internet connection.
errors.arjsLoadError: Failed to load AR.js. Please check your internet connection.
errors.httpsRequired: Camera requires HTTPS or localhost. On iPhone, IP address won't work. Please use ngrok or test on computer.
errors.fixStep1: Check the camera icon in your browser's address bar
errors.fixStep2: Click the icon and select 'Allow' camera access
errors.fixStep3: Refresh the page and try again
errors.fixStepIPhone1: On iPhone: Camera only works with HTTPS
errors.fixStepIPhone3: Run: ngrok http 3000 and use the HTTPS URL from ngrok

messages.question: Please tell me information about Bat Dan Street mentioned in the book
messages.error: Sorry, I'm having connection issues. Please try again later!
